name: InfinitLander
description:
A remake of the Old Classic Lunar Lander with Old School Arcade Line Graphics with New School Physics and Fluid Dynamics

Version 2

Version 2 Adds New Game Mechanism. You get to the planet, gather the crystals, you re dock with the orbiter. repeat until the orbiter is full and proceed to the next level.

Levels get progressively harder

The mass acquired in the cargo affects your lander momentum.

Alt+Enter for full Screen/Windowed Mode

Set to Windowed Mode to Exit via Close Box

Arrows for controlling the lander

I for ILS

A for Landing AI

Re-dock to Refuel

S to switch Shader for the FLuid Dynamic Rendering

InfinitLander.exe (SETUP PROGRAM)

InfinitLanderSRE.exe (Single Running EXE, No Setup)

InifnitLander.zip (Zipped Program, No Installation)
